issue.title: [Packaging] Remove arrow/ and parquet-cpp/ dependencies in dev/run_docker_compose.sh
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3525](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3525). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because we merge parquet-cpp into the Apache Arrow repository.

 

Can someone work on this?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3525?focusedCommentId=16685329) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~kszucs]` was this completed?
